author: pipermerriam
content:
Questions that I'd like us to answer on the ACD call this Thursday.  If EL clients can weigh in here before Thursday so that we can get some of the discussion and ideas processed before the call.

- A: For testnet deployments, we are going for May 1st on Sepolia.  Is this correct and broadly agreed on?
- B: What is the cutoff block on Sepolia for which clients will be dropping data?
- C: For mainnet drop, what do EL clients want in terms of drop date with respect to Pectra?  Same date as Pectra go-live?  Some date shortly after?
- D: Agreement in eth/69 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9237

author: brbrrrrr
content: Questions that I'd like us to answer on
